md:
giải nghĩa từ "ditching" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Ditching: (verb) to abandon or get rid of something or someone
	+ Meaning in Vietnamese: bỏ rơi, từ bỏ
	+ Example sentence: "She's ditching her old phone for a new one."
	+ Related words: abandon, get rid of, dump, discard

* Ditching: (verb) to avoid or skip something, especially a responsibility or a task
	+ Meaning in Vietnamese: tránh, trốn
	+ Example sentence: "He's ditching his homework to play video games."
	+ Related words: avoid, skip, evade, shirk

* Ditching: (verb) to leave someone or something in a difficult or unpleasant situation
	+ Meaning in Vietnamese: bỏ lại, bỏ rơi
	+ Example sentence: "The company ditched its employees when it went bankrupt."
	+ Related words: abandon, leave, desert, strand
html:
giải nghĩa từ "ditching" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Ditching: (verb) to abandon or get rid of something or someone

    • Meaning in Vietnamese: bỏ rơi, từ bỏ
    • Example sentence: "She's ditching her old phone for a new one."
    • Related words: abandon, get rid of, dump, discard

  • Ditching: (verb) to avoid or skip something, especially a responsibility or a task

    • Meaning in Vietnamese: tránh, trốn
    • Example sentence: "He's ditching his homework to play video games."
    • Related words: avoid, skip, evade, shirk

  • Ditching: (verb) to leave someone or something in a difficult or unpleasant situation

    • Meaning in Vietnamese: bỏ lại, bỏ rơi
    • Example sentence: "The company ditched its employees when it went bankrupt."
    • Related words: abandon, leave, desert, strand
